title: User Registration with Email Verification
description: Verify that new users can register with valid data and complete email verification successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid email, strong password, and submit registration form
Check registration success message is displayed
Open email client and click verification link received
Confirm email is verified and user account is activated

title: User Login with Correct and Incorrect Credentials
description: Check that users can login successfully with correct credentials and are blocked with incorrect credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid username/email and password
Click login button
Verify user is successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard
Logout from account
Input invalid username/email or password
Click login button
Verify login fails with error message and user is not authenticated

title: AI-Powered Trading Assistant Query and Response
description: Validate that the AI Trading Assistant (TreadGPT) accepts multi-modal inputs and provides accurate, relevant market insights promptly.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Trading Assistant page
Enter a text query for stock market analysis
Verify assistant provides a relevant, accurate response within 3 seconds
Send input with mixed modal content if applicable (e.g., text + image file)
Confirm assistant handles multi-modal input and returns insightful output
Send invalid or ambiguous query
Verify assistant handles errors gracefully and suggests valid alternatives

title: Real-Time AI Predictions Accuracy and Confidence Display
description: Ensure AI prediction system displays stock predictions with confidence scores, matches expected accuracy, and updates within 3 seconds.

steps.description: Navigate to AI Predictions page
Select multiple stocks for prediction
Verify predictions include confidence scores and technical analysis data
Check predictions refresh within 3 seconds of market data updates
Evaluate prediction accuracy over multiple sessions to ensure it meets 85% or above

title: Stock Screener Filters and Saving Custom Screens
description: Verify stock screener filters stocks correctly by multiple criteria and allows saving of custom screen results.

steps.description: Navigate to Stock Screener page
Apply multiple filters including price range, volume, technical indicators, and fundamentals
Verify filtered list only contains stocks matching criteria
Save current filter settings as a custom screen
Confirm custom screen can be recalled and reapplied correctly
Apply filters with edge case values (e.g., zero volume, extreme price)
Ensure screener returns appropriate results or empty list without errors

title: Paper Trading Order Placement and Position Tracking
description: Test paper trading system allows simulated order placement, updates positions accurately, and reflects in portfolio.

steps.description: Navigate to Paper Trading page
Place a simulated buy order for a selected stock
Verify order appears in order history with correct details and status
Confirm position reflects new holdings after simulated execution
Place an order exceeding available simulated balance
Verify order is rejected with appropriate error message

title: Backtesting Suite - Strategy Upload, Execution, and Analytics
description: Validate professional backtesting supports strategy building, executes over historical data, and provides detailed performance analytics.

steps.description: Navigate to Backtesting Suite page
Create or upload a trading strategy script or visual design
Run backtest over selected historical period
Confirm backtest completes without errors and results are displayed
Verify analytics include Sharpe ratio, max drawdown, return, and other performance metrics
Input invalid or incomplete strategy configuration
Check system displays valid error messages and prevents backtest execution

title: Portfolio Management Analytics Accuracy
description: Ensure portfolio management module tracks positions accurately and displays real-time risk analytics, asset allocation, and tax optimization suggestions.

steps.description: Navigate to Portfolio Management page
Add multiple positions representing different asset classes
Verify positions are listed correctly with real-time price updates
Check risk analytics include volatility, beta, and value at risk calculations
Confirm asset allocation visualization matches input positions
Validate tax optimization suggestions align with portfolio composition
Modify or remove portfolio positions
Ensure updates reflect immediately in analytics and visualizations

title: Price Alerts Setup and Notification Delivery
description: Verify users can create price alerts with multiple criteria and receive timely notifications via email and in-app scheduler.

steps.description: Navigate to Price Alerts page
Create price alert for a stock with above threshold value and volume condition
Confirm alert is saved and listed in active alerts
Simulate market price reaching alert condition
Verify user receives an email notification promptly
Ensure in-app alert notification is displayed via scheduler
Create alerts with invalid or conflicting criteria
Verify system rejects invalid alerts with descriptive errors

title: Advanced Charting and Technical Indicators Functionality
description: Test that charts render correctly with real-time data, support 50+ technical indicators and AI pattern recognition and respond accurately to user interactions.

steps.description: Navigate to Market Data & Charts section
Load different stocks charts with real-time price data
Ensure charts load quickly (under 2 seconds) with current market data
Apply various technical indicators (e.g., RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands)
Confirm indicators display correctly and update dynamically
Activate AI-driven pattern recognition overlay
Verify suggested patterns are accurate and updated real-time
Perform zoom, pan, and timeframe changes on charts
Ensure charts respond smoothly without performance degradation

title: Watchlist Management and Real-Time Price Updates
description: Validate users can add, remove and search stocks in watchlist and see real-time price updates reflected immediately.

steps.description: Navigate to Watchlist page
Add multiple stocks to watchlist including edge case stocks (e.g. low volume, OTC)
Verify stocks appear in watchlist with initial price data
Confirm prices update in real-time as market data changes
Search for a stock within watchlist and remove it
Ensure removed stock disappears immediately

title: News Feed and AI Sentiment Analysis Accuracy
description: Test that market news feed loads timely news items and sentiment analysis reflects content accurately with multi-source validation.

steps.description: Navigate to News page
Observe news feed loading recent market news from multiple sources
Verify news items load within 2 seconds and display source attribution
Confirm sentiment analysis matches article tone and shows clear positive/neutral/negative indicators
Trigger refresh or apply news keywords filtering
Ensure news feed updates correctly without duplicate or missing items

title: Top Gainers and Losers Market Overview Updates
description: Check that Top Gainers and Losers data refreshes session-aware and updates displays accurately with correct metrics.

steps.description: Navigate to Top Gainers & Losers page
Observe the list and performance metrics displayed
Verify data refreshes based on market session time and reflects real market movements
Check data correctness against external verified sources
Filter top movers using provided filters
Confirm list updates according to filters without errors

title: Authentication Security and Password Management
description: Verify secure authentication with password recovery, secure password storage, and email verification enforcement.

steps.description: Attempt login with correct credentials
Verify user authentication succeeds
Attempt login with incorrect passwords multiple times
Confirm accounts lockout or throttling triggers to prevent brute force
Initiate forgotten password recovery flow
Verify secure password reset link is sent and functions correctly
Attempt to register duplicate emails or malformed passwords
Check system rejects invalid input with proper errors

title: Scalability and High Availability Under Load
description: Test system maintains performance and 99.9% uptime under simulated load of over 10,000 concurrent users.

steps.description: Simulate 10,000 concurrent users executing typical workflows (login, AI queries, backtesting, trading)
Verify system uptime remains above 99.9%
Confirm response times remain acceptable (AI predictions under 3s, page loads under 2s)
Monitor error rates and verify no critical failures or data inconsistencies occur

title: User Experience Accessibility Compliance (WCAG 2.1 AA)
description: Verify that all key user interface features comply with WCAG 2.1 AA, ensuring accessibility for users with disabilities.

steps.description: Navigate through all major UI components and pages using keyboard only
Confirm all interactive controls are focusable and operable via keyboard
Use screen reader to navigate key pages
Verify correct semantic roles, labels, and alerts are announced
Check color contrast ratios for all texts and interactive elements
Confirm contrast meets or exceeds WCAG 2.1 AA requirements

title: Error Handling for AI Predictions System Failures
description: Test system response when AI prediction engine is unavailable or returns errors, ensuring graceful degradation.

steps.description: Simulate AI prediction service downtime or errors
Request AI stock predictions from the UI
Verify system displays informative error messages without crashes
Confirm fallback UI or retry mechanisms are in place

title: Paper Trading System Edge Cases - Order Cancellation and Partial Fill
description: Validate correct handling of order cancellations and partial fills in simulated trading environment.

steps.description: Place a simulated limit order for a stock
Cancel the open order before execution
Verify order status updates to cancelled and no position is added
Simulate partial fill of a limit order
Confirm position reflects partially filled quantity accurately
Ensure order updates reflect filled and remaining quantities correctly
